title: Voxonomics 1-3
author: VD
content_html:
This week’s interview is with Dr. Frank Shostak, Chief Economist at MF Global and a noted scholar of Austrian economics. Download Voxonomics 1-3.

Related Reading:

An Introduction to Austrian Economics by Thomas C. Taylor

In Defense of Austrian Theory

The Fallacy of Inflation Fighting

Money and Inflation: The Tendency to Deny Reality

How Much Money Should There Be
